boo.translation[0].definitions[0].defini: to shout ‘boo’ to show that you do not like a person, performance, idea etc
boo.translation[0].definitions[0].exampl: Some of the audience started booing.
She was booed off stage  (=they shouted ‘boo’ until she left the stage).
boo.translation[1].definitions[0].defini: a noise made by people who do not like a person, performance, idea etc
boo.translation[1].definitions[1].defini: a word you shout suddenly to someone as a joke in order to frighten them
